text: László Gálos (3 April 1933 - 11 September 2020) was a Hungarian volleyball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Bátaszék, Hungary. Gálos died on 11 September 2020 in Budapest at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Hungarian volleyball players
title: László Gálos
